item.title: Jooklo Duo, Mik Quantius, Steffen Roth + Stephan Deller + Gregor Forbes
item.description: Last show for this year! 人人人 Don’t miss it! Doors: 19h00 人人人 Start: 20h15 Jooklo Duo [psychjazz / Italy] Was about time to bring the Jooklo experience to our little fair city. Roaming the improv and weird music underground already since the mid-00’s, David Vanzan and Virginia Genta (also known through projects such as Golden Jooklo Age, Jooklo Quartet, Jooklo Stellar Tribe, Neokarma Jooklo Trio, New Jooklo Age etc.) will now bring some chakric, mental no-jazz to Leipzig for the first time.
